 <font size="6">Hello!</font> 

<div style="width:200px; height=1700px">
![](portrait.jpg) 
</div>

I`m Melanie, a quantitative ecologist currently working at the [Natural History Museum in Berlin](https://www.naturkundemuseum.berlin/en/einblicke/mitarbeiter/melanie.tietje), Germany. I am interested in the possibilities of combining neontological and paleontological data to learn from past events about our possible future. I work on extinction risk influencing factors, geographic range size patterns, and recently on the combination of climatic and biological data.
